name: Our Team Members – Team Members WordPress Plugin
author: wpbean

sections.description:
Our Team Members WordPress Plugin helps you to show the team members in a couple of different style with different contents. It allows you to add custom social icons to each team member. It has a couple of different skins for different types of design. A powerful shortcode builder allows you to create the team member shortcode shortly and uses it anywhere on your site to show the team members.

Our Team Members WordPress Plugin has Visual Composer, King Composer, and Elementor page builder support. If you are using any of the builders, you can use our builder element to show the team members.

It has category options. You can add different team members in different categories. Then you can create multiple team shortcodes to show multiple team member grids.

  • Live DEMO
  • Support Forum
  • Documentation

Plugin Features:

  • 5 different skins for showing team members in different style.
  • Powerful shortcode builder for easy customization of the team members.
  • Visual Composer, Elementor, King Composer page builder supported.
  • Huge customization options, Skin, columns, number, order etc.
  • Option for showing category specefic team members in multiple shortcodes on same page.
  • Full responsive minimal clean design.
  • Shortcode generator for easy use.
  • All modern browser support.
  • Work with all WordPress theme & Tested with huge number of popular themes.
  • Translation, Multi-language & RTL ready.

Available fields

  • Name
  • Description/bio
  • Photo
  • Social icons & links
  • Designation
  • Location
  • Skills
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Use this pluginâ€™s ShortCode to show the team member on your site.

  • You can adjust the plugin from the plugin settings and shortcode parameters.

Method 1 (Upload):

  1. Go to your WordPress admin then go to Plugins > Add new > Upload

  2. Then select the installable file fom you download folder.

  3. Upload and active the plugin and you are ready to go.

Method 2 (FTP):

  1. Upload the plugin to your server plugin directory and make sure you don’t upload the zip file.

  2. Then go back to your WordPress admin and go to Plugins > Installed Plugins

  3. If you successfully upload the plugin You will find Our Team Members here.

  4. Active the plugin and you are ready to go.
sections.faq:
How to show the Team members?

Use this plugins shortcode for showing the Team members.

Where to get the ShortCodes?

This plugin comes with a shortcode generator. Go through the documentation for details.
sections.changelog:
version 1.0

  • Initial release

version 1.0.1

  • Added WordPress 4.9.6 support.

version 1.0.2

  • Added WordPress 5.0.3 support.
  • Team category column id added.

version 1.0.3

  • Small style issue fixed.

version 1.0.4

  • Added WordPress 5.2 support.

version 1.0.5

  • Added WordPress 5.2.2 support.
  • Added filter hook for team slug.

version 1.0.6

  • Added WordPress 5.2.4 support.

version 1.0.7

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6

version 1.0.8

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6.1

version 1.0.9

  • Theme template directory name changed to the plugin slug.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.7.1

version 2.0

  • Grid system updated.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4.2
  • Code quality improved.

version 2.1

  • Added new orderby options.

short_description: You can add team members and show them with name, photo, bio, designation, skills, social icons, and more with our Team Members WordPress Plugin.
